name: Figma onboarding
description:
Quickstart for Figma: this prototype file is for anyone who’s new to Figma, or Shopify, and wants to get up-to-speed quickly.


Figma is Shopify’s default tool for product design and prototyping. We designed this onboarding experience to help new employees learn the tool’s basics and how to use it for their role. 


As education needs for our new hires varies according to experience level, role, and specific discipline, we’ve kept the onboarding information high-level. 


In this file you’ll find sections on:

  • The basics of Figma (hierarchy, terminology)
  • Collaborating (roles and permissions, commenting, observing)
  • Shortcuts
  • Working with components
  • Prototyping basics
